string-array.name: lawandorder
string-array.item: No close by police station in my area.
Rowdiness is on the rise in the neighbourhood.
Judgements are being dragged for long, improve the judiciary.
Police station not well maintained, gives gloomy feeling.
Courts are becoming totally unaffordable, do something.
Increase constable/Inspector salary, bribery is rising.
Police is not working hard enough to reach to people.
High level of distrust on police.
Should not be there a police awareness day, once in 3 months, where citizen should be encouraged to review their police stations, if they are happy with services of staff.
Court system sucks, i want to bow out of contract of signing the constitution.
Should not there be a court awareness day, once in 3 months, where citizens should be encouraged to review their courts, to check that they are happy with services of the staff.

string-array.name: water
string-array.item: No municipality water in this area.
We have to heavily rely on tankers for water supply, please look into it.
Water pipes leaking all over the place, water contamination danger looming.
Don\'t know how water come to the city, please launch a water awareness day.

string-array.name: electricity
string-array.item: Enough these power cuts, increase power generation capacity.
Power stations and transformers not well maintained, making my area look dirty.
Transformers unprotected. Blast every now and then.
Power lines are hanging too low in my neighbourhood.
Power too costly, totally unaffordable, reduce prices.
No initiative from power department on educating customer.
Why we do not have electricity awareness day, I want to know what I pay for.

string-array.name: transportation
string-array.item: No public buses on this route.
No public buses in my area.
Traffic Congestion too much we need metro tracks.
This point has become congestion hot-spot do something.
Please have a training programme before giving auto licenses.
Citizen want to know how bus system work please launch a awareness campaign.

string-array.name: road
string-array.item: What will we do without roads, no roads here, city sucks.
There are potholes everywhere on this road.
These Roads are dirty all the time, do somethings.
How these road tenders get allocated, as citizen we need to know, please launch a awareness programme.
No cleanliness, launch an awareness programme on how citizens can help.

string-array.name: sewage
string-array.item: No Sewage pipe in my area.
No close by municipality garbage truck in my area.
Please increase the garbage truck capacity.
Lot of garbage is left unaddressed.
My surrounding has become a garbage yard, please take care of it.
Garbage has made environment like hell, is this the city we dreamt of.
Streets are dirty all the time, please launch awareness programme. Explain how citizens can help

resources.string: Together we deliver governance. Sarvajan Hitay, Sarvajan Sukhay
Thank you for contacting us. We will soon look into the matter.
Pic of MLA of the area
